project.name: Sunrise
project.description: Project Sunrise provides a gentoo user overlay - the team members take care of the health of the overlay

p.b: What Project Sunrise is and how it evolves

longdescription.p: Project Sunrise is about an overlay where users that would like to contribute ebuilds can get access. Specifics are described in the http://overlays.gentoo.org/proj/sunrise/wiki/SunriseFaq

project.goals: Our goals include for example: - provide a central home for contributed ebuilds that do not (yet) find a place in the portage tree - encourage users to write ebuilds - find new recruits - make maintainer-wanted ebuild access and development easier - work with users on new ebuilds and explain them what they can do better

body.p: The best way to reach us is on IRC in the #gentoo-sunrise channel on irc.freenode.net.
